full_text: FORM G-325A (REV. 8-27-72)N Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 Form Approved UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB No. 43-R436 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. LEANG YUE TSI FEMALE APRIL 4, 1910 CHINA ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR 2210, GREENFIELD , WICHITA KANSAS U.S.A. 3 1973 PRESENT TIME NO2-3 ALLEY 6, LANE 123, SECTION TAIPE TAIWAN CHINA 6 1968 3 1973 5, NANKING E. RD. APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR N023 ALLEY6, LANE-123, NANKING RD TAIPEI TAIWAN CHINA 6 1968 3 1973 APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST. FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (SPECIFY) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR PRESENT TIME Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT OR PETITIONER DATE NATURALIZATION ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS APPLICATION FOR STATUS OTHER (SPECIFY): AS R. IF THAN ROMAN YOUR NAME IN YOUR YOUR Yue NATIVE ALPHABET IS Zosi IN OTHER Leang LETTERS. WRITE 2, NATIVE AUG, ALPHABET IN 1973 THIS SPACE: Are all copies legible? Yes Step PENALTIES : SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT.
